lexUnit.name: disappearance.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the act of ceasing to be visible

sentence.text: His colleagues at the NSC , John Lang continued , had given him the nickname ` Knight Rider " , after the television hero ( " one man and his machine , dedicated to the righting of wrongs " ) , for his disappearances to confer with the contras .
